title: Scary Story Night: Family
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I reall enjoyed this, Mary! You are such a great and talented author! Cant wait for the next one :)
You're quite an author, I love your use of words and how the sentences flow. I want more!!!!!!
That was one of the most compelling things I've ever heard. You have true talent.
Great story. I'm a writer myself I will email you one of my scary stories.
description:
I DO NOT OWN THE IMAGES OR MUSIC IN THE VIDEO. Images are public, without copyright, and fair use. Music is Tubular Bells and fair use.

First Halloween 2017 Scary Story Night. Tonights' episode features Family, by Mary Ann Moody. To have your story featured on the Scary Story nights, please send it to: marygirlmoody@gmail.com. USE SCARY STORY IN THE SUBJECT LINE. One story per person for entry and word limit 5K words.
